data.message: We ALL want to know how you do our own and you haven't responded to a single person who has asked. People have commented, "Thanks for this video" or whatever, and that gets a response, but you can't respond when someone asks how they can share their own. I would think it would be a simple response such as, "Sorry no personal ones this year" or "Of corse you can! Here's how......"

replies.message: Hey Amber. We're glad to hear that you are excited about creating your own Year in Review. Your personalized Year in Review will be available very soon! Stay tuned! -Natalie
